history.proof: intros. unfold internal_msg in H. unfold tagFromParticipant in H0. unfold Label in l. shelve.

exceptions.exn: The LHS of H (coord_msg tag from to || participant_msg tag from to) does not match any subterm of the goal
Cannot coerce Ordered.type to an evaluable reference.

In environment l : [ordType of nat] cn : nid pts, others : seq nid Hnin : cn \ otin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] tag : nat from, to : nid H : coord_msg tag from to || participant_msg tag from to H0 : tag \\in [:: prep_yes; prep_no; commit_ack; abort_ack] Unable to unify "is_true (tag \\in [:: prep_yes; prep_no; commit_ack; abort_ack])" with "is_true (to == cn)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
l: Ordered.sort Label
cn: nid
others: seq nid
pts: seq nid
Hnin: is_true (cn \notin pts)
PtsNonEmpty: is_true (pts != [::])
tag: nat
to: nid
from: nid

Goal:
internal_msg tag from to -> tagFromParticipant tag -> to == cn

Premises:
is_true = eq^~ true : bool -> Prop Arguments is_true _%bool_scope is_true is a coercion
internal_msg = fun (tag : nat) (from to : nid) => coord_msg tag from to || participant_msg tag from to : nat -> nid -> nid -> bool Arguments internal_msg _%nat_scope
sort : forall T : Type, rel T -> seq T -> seq T
nid = nat : Set
tagFromParticipant = in_mem^~ (mem [:: prep_yes; prep_no; commit_ack; abort_ack]) : nat -> bool Arguments tagFromParticipant _%nat_scope
Notation seq := list
Inductive nat : Set := O : nat | S : nat -> nat Arguments S _%nat_scope
Label = [ordType of nat] : ordType
participant_msg = fun (tag : nat) (from to : nid) => [&& from \in pts, to == cn & tagFromParticipant tag] : nat -> nid -> nid -> bool Arguments participant_msg _%nat_scope
dyn_val : forall x : {x : ?A & ?P x}, ?P (projT1 x) where ?A : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] tag : nat from : nid to : nid |- Type] ?P : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] tag : nat from : nid to : nid |- ?A -> Type]
pn_step_coh : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (ptag : ttag) (prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop), (forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn cn pts this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg cn pts {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1) -> forall commit : bool, s_step_coh_t (TPCCoh cn pts others) ptag (pn_step commit)
msg_specE : forall (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (from to : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType), valid s -> no_msg_from_to from to s -> msg_spec from to tg cnt (post_msg s {| content := {| tag := tg; tms_cont := cnt |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |}).1
msg_spec_consume : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (from to tg : nat) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (cnt' : seq nat) (i : mid), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := {| tag := tg; tms_cont := cnt' |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> msg_spec from to tg cnt s -> no_msg_from_to from to (consume_msg s i)
pn_send_trans : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall (ptag : ttag) (prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop), (forall (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn cn pts this to -> prec s m -> cohMsg cn pts {| content := {| tag := ptag; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1) -> bool -> Transitions.send_trans (TPCCoh cn pts others)
TwoPhaseProtocol.TPCProtocol.pn_gen_send_trans_obligation_1 : forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall t : ttag, t \in [:: prep_yes; prep_no; commit_ack; abort_ack] -> forall (ps : data -> PState) (this to : nat_eqType) (s : PStateT) (m : payload), HPn cn pts this to -> send_prep_resp_prec ps s m -> cohMsg cn pts {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := m |}; from := this; to := to; active := true |} s.1
cast : forall (interp : ?C -> Type) (A B : ?C), A = B -> interp B -> interp A where ?C : [l : Label cn : nid pts : seq nid others : seq nid Hnin : cn \notin pts PtsNonEmpty : pts != [::] tag : nat from : nid to : nid |- Type]
msg_in_soup = fun (from to : nid) (criterion : nat -> seq nat -> bool) (d : soup) => (exists ! i : mid, exists (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |}) /\ (forall (i : mid) (t : nat) (c : seq nat), find i d = Some {| content := {| tag := t; tms_cont := c |}; from := from; to := to; active := true |} -> criterion t c) : nid -> nid -> (nat -> seq nat -> bool) -> soup -> Prop Arguments msg_in_soup _ _ _%function_scope
pn_step : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop), bool -> forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), pn_safe others Hnin prec this to d msg -> option (union_map_classPCM heapUMC)
pn_safe_in : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : data), pn_safe others Hnin prec this to d m -> this \in nodes cn pts others /\ to \in nodes cn pts others
pn_safe_coh : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : data), pn_safe others Hnin prec this to d m -> TPCCoh cn pts others d
cohMsg = fun (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid) (ms : msg TaggedMessage) (y : nat) => if from ms == cn then to ms \in pts /\ msgFromCoordinator (content ms) y else if from ms \in pts then to ms == cn /\ msgFromParticipant (content ms) y else True : nid -> seq nid -> msg TaggedMessage -> nat -> Prop Arguments cohMsg _ _%seq_scope _ _%nat_scope
msg_spec = fun (from to : nid) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) => msg_in_soup from to (fun (x : nat) (y : seq nat) => (x == tg) && (y == cnt)) : nid -> nid -> nat_eqType -> seq_eqType nat_eqType -> soup -> Prop
HPn = fun (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid) (this to : nat_eqType) => this \in pts /\ to == cn : nid -> seq nid -> nat_eqType -> nat_eqType -> Prop Arguments HPn _ _%seq_scope
msgFromCoordinator = fun (tms : TaggedMessage) (y : nat) => if tag tms == prep_req then exists data : seq nat, tms = y :: data else if tag tms == commit_req then tms = [:: y] else if tag tms == abort_req then tms = [:: y] else False : TaggedMessage -> nat -> Prop Arguments msgFromCoordinator _ _%nat_scope
msg_specE' : forall (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (from : nid) (to to' tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (tms : TaggedMessage), valid s -> (to == to') = false -> msg_spec from to tg cnt s -> msg_spec from to tg cnt (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from; to := to'; active := true |}).1
msg_specE'' : forall (s : union_mapPCM mid (msg TaggedMessage)) (from from' : nat_eqType) (to : nid) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (tms : TaggedMessage), valid s -> (from == from') = false -> msg_spec from to tg cnt s -> msg_spec from to tg cnt (post_msg s {| content := tms; from := from'; to := to'; active := true |}).1
pn_safe_def : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (prec : PStateT -> payload -> Prop) (commit : bool) (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : data), pn_safe others Hnin prec this to d msg < -> (exists (b : union_map_classPCM heapUMC) (pf : pn_safe others Hnin prec this to d msg), pn_step commit pf = Some b)
msg_specE_consume1 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nat_eqType) (from : nat) (to : nid) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> pt != from -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
msg_specE_consume : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nat_eqType) (from : nat) (to : nat_eqType) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> (pt != from) || (to != to') -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
msg_specE_consume2 : forall (s : union_map_classPCM (union_mapUMC mid (msg TaggedMessage))) (pt : nid) (from : nat) (to : nat_eqType) (to' : nat) (tg : nat_eqType) (cnt : seq_eqType nat_eqType) (i : mid) (m : TaggedMessage), valid s -> find i s = Some {| content := m; from := from; to := to'; active := true |} -> to != to' -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt s -> msg_spec pt to tg cnt (consume_msg s i)
tag = fun t : TaggedMessage => let (tag, _) := t in tag : TaggedMessage -> nat
pn_this_in : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (this to : nat_eqType), HPn cn pts this to -> this \in nodes cn pts others
SendTrans : forall (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) (t_snd : nat) (send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop), (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d) -> (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> this \in nodes d /\ to \in nodes d) -> forall send_step : Transitions.send_step_t send_safe, (forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (msg : seq nat), send_safe this to d msg <-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b)) -> Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step -> Transitions.send_trans coh
this_not_pts' : forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall this : nat_eqType, this == cn -> this \notin pts
Ordered.sort = fun t : ordType => let (sort, _) := t in sort : ordType -> Type Ordered.sort is a coercion
msgFromParticipant = fun (tms : TaggedMessage) (y : nat) => tagFromParticipant (tag tms) && (tms == [:: y]) : TaggedMessage -> nat -> bool Arguments msgFromParticipant _ _%nat_scope
no_msg_from_to = fun (from to : nat) (d : soup) => forall (i : mid) (tms : TaggedMessage) (b : bool), find i d = Some {| content := tms; from := from; to := to; active := b |} -> b = false : nat -> nat -> soup -> Prop Arguments no_msg_from_to (_ _)%nat_scope
Record send_trans (nodes : dstatelet -> pred nid) (coh : cohpred nodes) : Type := SendTrans { t_snd : nat; send_safe : nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> seq nat -> Prop; s_safe_coh : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m -> coh d; s_safe_in : forall (this to : nid) (d : dstatelet) (m : seq nat), send_safe this to d m ->...-> (exists (b : heap) (pf : send_safe this to d msg), send_step this to d msg pf = Some b); s_step_coh : Transitions.s_step_coh_t coh t_snd send_step } Arguments Transitions.send_trans [nodes]%function_scope Arguments Transitions.SendTrans [nodes]%function_scope [coh] [t_snd]%nat_scope [send_safe]%function_scope (_ _)%function_scope [send_step] _%function_scope
this_not_pts : forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall this : nat_eqType, this \in pts -> (this == cn) = false
TwoPhaseCommitProtocol : forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), seq nid -> cn \notin pts -> Label -> protocol
Exports.TwoPhaseCommitProtocol : forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), seq nid -> cn \notin pts -> Label -> protocol
pn_safe : forall (cn : nid) (pts : seq nid), seq nid -> cn \notin pts -> (PStateT -> payload -> Prop) -> nid -> nid -> dstatelet -> data -> Prop
rp_step : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> ttag -> receive_step_t (TPCCoh cn pts others)
rp_recv_trans : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> ttag -> (forall d : dstatelet, TPCCoh cn pts others d -> nid -> nid -> pred payload) -> Transitions.receive_trans (TPCCoh cn pts others)
rp_step_coh : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid) (Hnin : cn \notin pts) (rp_tag : ttag) (rp_wf : forall d : dstatelet, TPCCoh cn pts others d -> nid -> nid -> pred payload), r_step_coh_t (fun (d : dstatelet) (x : TPCCoh cn pts others d) (x0 x1 : nid) (x2 : TaggedMessage) => rp_wf d x x0 x1 x2) rp_tag (rp_step Hnin rp_tag)
Record TaggedMessage : Set := TMsg { tag : nat; tms_cont : seq nat } Arguments TMsg _%nat_scope _%seq_scope
pn_gen_send_trans : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> forall t : ttag, t \in [:: prep_yes; prep_no; commit_ack; abort_ack] -> (data -> PState) -> bool -> Transitions.send_trans (TPCCoh cn pts others)
tpc_sends : forall (cn : nid) (pts others : seq nid), cn \notin pts -> seq (send_trans (TPCCoh cn pts others))

original: intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. intros. unfold internal_msg in H. unfold tagFromParticipant in H0. rewrite H in H0. simpl in H0. unfold ordType in l. unfold Label in l. apply (H0).
